statements: SELECT * FROM CourseFeedback
SELECT student_name, course_code, rating FROM CourseFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT course_code, rating FROM CourseFeedback WHERE rating > 4
SELECT feedback_id, student_name, feedback_text FROM CourseFeedback ORDER BY feedback_id ASC
SELECT * FROM CourseFeedback WHERE student_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM CourseFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY student_name DESC, feedback_id ASC
SELECT student_name, course_code FROM CourseFeedback WHERE rating < 2
SELECT feedback_text FROM CourseFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 100
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM CourseFeedback
SELECT student_name, course_code, rating FROM CourseFeedback WHERE course_code LIKE 'CS%'
SELECT * FROM student_feedback;
SELECT feedback FROM student_feedback WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT course_id, evaluation FROM course_evaluations;
SELECT * FROM student_feedback WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, feedback FROM student_feedback ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_feedback ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, feedback FROM student_feedback WHERE student_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT feedback, student_id FROM student_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY feedback DESC;
SELECT course_id, evaluation FROM course_evaluations ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_feedback ORDER BY student_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM StudentFeedback LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, feedback_text FROM StudentFeedback WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, course_id, submitted_at FROM StudentFeedback ORDER BY submitted_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CourseEvaluations WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT student_name, email, program FROM Students WHERE age < 25;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE program = 'Computer Science';
SELECT evaluation_text, rating, evaluated_at FROM CourseEvaluations WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY evaluated_at DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, course_id FROM StudentFeedback WHERE course_id = 3 ORDER BY submitted_at ASC;
SELECT AVG(rating) as average_rating, course_id FROM CourseEvaluations GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT student_name, program, age FROM Students WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 25 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, feedback FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, evaluation_date FROM Students JOIN Evaluations ON Students.student_id = Evaluations.student_id ORDER BY evaluation_date;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_id, feedback FROM Students WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, feedback_text, rating FROM Students s JOIN Feedback f ON s.student_id = f.student_id ORDER BY f.rating DESC;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM Courses c JOIN Feedback f ON c.course_id = f.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, department FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, rating FROM student_feedback WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT instructor_id, hire_date FROM instructors WHERE hire_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, department FROM courses WHERE instructor_id = 101 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT name, email, hire_date FROM instructors WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN student_feedback ON students.student_id = student_feedback.student_id WHERE rating > 4.5;

SELECT c.course_name, i.name, cf.feedback FROM courses c JOIN course_evaluations ce ON c.course_id = ce.course_id JOIN instructors i ON c.instructor_id = i.instructor_id JOIN student_feedback cf ON c.course_id = cf.course_id WHERE ce.rating >= 4.0 ORDER BY cf.feedback ASC;
